properties.description: Move files from one folder to another folder

sources.name: CropTypeCSV
sources.script:
source(output(
		term as string,
		name as string,
		state as string,
		definition as string,
		category as string,
		provenance as string,
		provenance_uri as string,
		note as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CropTypeCSV

sinks.name: CropTypeCvDb
sinks.script:
CropTypeCSV sink(input(
		Name as string,
		Term as string,
		Definition as string,
		State as string,
		SourceVocabularyURI as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['term'],
	mapColumn(
		Name = name,
		Term = term,
		Definition = definition,
		State = state,
		SourceVocabularyURI = provenance_uri
	)) ~> CropTypeCvDb
